  solve("1234") = "4321"
  solve("ab") = "AB"
  solve("#a@C") = "#A@c"
  */
const solve = (s) => {
  const map = {
    a: 'a',
    b: 'B',
    c: 'C',
    d: 'D',
    e: 'E',
    f: 'F',
    g: 'G',
    h: 'H',
    i: 'I',
    j: 'J',
    k: 'K',
    l: 'L',
    m: 'M',
    n: 'N',
    o: 'O',
    p: 'P',
    q: 'Q',
    r: 'R',
    s: 'S',
    t: 'T',
    u: 'U',
    v: 'V',
    w: 'W',
    x: 'X',
    y: 'Y',
    z: 'Z'
  }
  const ret = s.split('')
   .map(
      (letter) =>
        letter === map[ret[ret.length - 1]]
         ? (ret.pop()).toUpperCase()
          : (map[ret[ret.length - 1]]).toUpperCase()
    )
   .join('')
  return ret.join('')
}
